section.title: Overview
section.p: The NCC charging application preferences are maintained in a common entity called TPASystem. All the application preferences are loaded on NCC application initialization within TPASystem. These application preferences are then loaded with some default values present in the Constants file.
section.note: To change the default value, log into the Service Manager Graphical User Interface (SM GUI). Navigate to Global configuration > Application Preferences and select Managed Elements from the hamburger menu. ( ). This opens the ME Application Preferences window from where you can select the required Managed Element (ME) from the drop-down list. Only the configured application preferences for ME that you need to work appears in the SM GUI.
